document_data.mainbody:
ixoxious was a kraken priestess and a member of the Cult of Talos in the late 15 century DR.
Nixoxious was a tiefling who wore blue robes.
Circa 1491 DR, Nixoxious led a group of berserkers from the Cult of Talos in an attack on the recently resettled town of Leilon. Their assault sent much of the towns inhabitants fleeing north along the High Road. The cultists captured a number of fishers and soldiers to use as human sacrifices to water elementals that Nixoxious attempted to ritually conjure to destroy the town. However, a group of adventurers managed to defeat her after she began the ritual.
